title: Pulse Survey

get_started.message: You are not alone on your road to personal growth. Pulse surveys are an easy way to get feedback from your colleagues while you focus on carrying out your developmental Action Plan.
get_started.empty_message: You have not yet created an action plan, which is required to create a pulse survey.

cta.recent_observations: In your recent observations, how often have you seen MRG Demo demonstrate behaviors associated with providing straightforward feedback (critiquing others' performance when needed, letting others know if they met expectations, informing others when they have met his/her needs)?
cta.additional_feedback: Do you have additional feedback for MRG Demo about demonstrating behaviors associated with providing straightforward feedback?

validation.action_plan: Please choose an Action Plan to create a pulse survey.
validation.due_date: You need to set a due date for this survey, make sure it’s in the future.
validation.send: You need to choose at least 3 people to send your Pulse Survey to.
validation.open_pulse_survey: You cannot create a new Pulse Survey Cycle for this Action Plan, you already have an open Pulse Survey.
validation.cannot_delete_survey: You cannot delete another Pulse Survey, you need at least three responses.
validation.completed_action_plan: You cannot create a new Pulse Survey Cycle for this Action Plan, you have already completed this Action Plan.

scores.required: All rating scale questions are required.

colleague_message.label: Message to Observers
colleague_message.placeholder: As you may know, I am working on a personal leadership development plan. Part of that plan involves gathering feedback on how I am doing towards meeting my development goals. I would like to ask you to assist me by filling out the attached survey. It is a quick and simple survey that you can complete from any device, including your phone. Please know that your answers to this survey remain anonymous and confidential and I will only see aggregate results presented. Thank you for your participation.

results.subject: :full_name Has Shared Their Leadership Pulse Survey Results With You
results.intro: :full_name has shared the results of a leadership development pulse survey with you.  Results are attached to this email in PDF format.

comments.label: Are there additional comments you would like to provide to this leader regarding these Innovative behaviors? (Optional)

disabled.resend_bulk: All your surveys are complete. Start a new cycle for more feedback.
disabled.view_results: You need at least 3 completed surveys to view results.

view_results.warning:
You have :open_surveys survey(s) that have not been completed yet.
Are you sure you want to end this survey cycle and view your results?
You will not be able to collect and view any more data for this cycle if you answer YES.
view_results.title: Warning

thankyou.message: Thank you for submitting your answers to this leadership development pulse survey. Please be assured that all responses will be kept anonymous.

completed.page_title: Sorry! This survey is already completed!
completed.message: Thank you for your interest in this Leadership Development Survey! This survey has already been completed.

cannot_complete: At least three people need to respond to this Pulse Survey before the results can be viewed.
no_additional_comments: There are no additional comments for this survey cycle.
cannot_create_pulse_surveys: All of your action plans either have an open survey or are completed. You cannot create a new Pulse Survey.
cannot_add_observers: You cannot add new Observers to this Pulse Survey, it is already complete.
contacts_added_successfully: You have successfully added new contacts to your Pulse Survey.

select_recipients.label: Select Recipients
select_recipients.no_recipients: You have sent this survey to all of your observers. Add a recipient using the "Add Recipient" button.
